name: CentralReport
tagline: Monitor your server or your computer very easily!
body:
CentralReport meets a simple need: ensuring the health of your computer. Continuously.

Using a simple browser with the IP address of your machine, you can view your real-time statistics:
* CPU
* Physical Memory (RAM)
* Virtual Memory (Swap)
* Load Average
* Uptime
* Disks

![Mac Screenshot](http://static.centralreport.net/CR_0.2.0.png)

CentralReport works on **Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS and Mac OS X**. A Windows version is planned.

It's developed by three students: @Guimove, @Ninir and @miniche. It's only the beginning: we have many ideas for CentralReport and others exciting and related projets.

**You can checkout our blog to read more about the project and the team: [blog.centralreport.net](http://blog.centralreport.net). And don't forget to follow us on Twitter: [@Central_Report](https://twitter.com/Central_Report)!**

****

## Install CentralReport
Our goal? Making it powerful and easy. To install CentralReport, one line a terminal is enough!
Please visit [the official documentation](http://docs.centralreport.net/unix-agent/install) to get the procedure depending on your system.

## Current status
__We are working on a cloud solution: you will be able to view all yours computers and servers, and set some email or push alerts.__

## The future
We have many ideas to simplify server monitoring:
* Cross platform (Unix, Linux, Windows)
* Standalone or Cloud conception
* Alerts (mobile push, mail, etc.)
* Highly customizable dashboard
* Plugins support
* For public or Pros

****
## Ressources
You can check:
* Our blog at [blog.centralreport.net](blog.centralreport.net)
* The official documentation at [docs.centralreport.net](docs.centralreport.net)
* The Github repositories at [github.com/CentralReport](https://github.com/CentralReport)

****

## Get in touch
We are open to the world. If you want more information or if you are in a mood to collaborate, feel free to contact us.
We will gladly answer to every email
